title: piano for all
description:
hi everyone , goog to be here at PB ,  this is my first post to the community. i hope someone finds it useful as i did

this is a very good course in piano playing without the note reading tedium , its has sound examples(500) and video clips(200) throuout all the volumes , this does work and i have gone from no knowledge of the piano to writing original songs thanks to using this bundle.

NOTE:
if you get any benefit that you are pleased with , then PLEASE consider suppporting this guy and buying the software , for more information google the torrent name


EDIT:
I forgot to include the intro PDF document which just explains how to use the files your downloading , it is quite simple really so il tell you here,
leave all sound and video files in the folders they came in and work your way through the PDF volumes ,you will see little icons at the side of the sections within the PDF's that have sound/video examples ,just click on these and the video/sound will automaticaly play
i recomend reading the extra bonus PDF quite early on as it gives you a good mindset for the coming influx of knowledge

enjoy the toy
